deity: The Lady of the North Star
markdown:
**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 241 1.1 **Traditions** [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4) **Deity** [The Lady of the North Star](/Deities.aspx?ID=303) **Defense** Will **Duration** 10 minutes --- A flowing cloak of utter darkness drapes over you, filled with pinpricks of light like distant stars. It imparts the stillness of the cosmos to you, granting you a +2 status bonus to [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=48) checks to [Hide](/Actions.aspx?ID=2404) and [Sneak](/Actions.aspx?ID=2405). While outside under a starry night sky, you're also [invisible](/Conditions.aspx?ID=83) as long as you remain still. When moving under a starry night sky, you're [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=62) instead. Gazing too closely into the stars is disorienting. Any creature that ends its turn adjacent to you must attempt a Will save; this is a [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=647), [visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=727) effect. **Success** The creature is unaffected.
**Failure** The creature is [dazzled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=65) until the end of its next turn.
**Critical Failure** The creature is [confused](/Conditions.aspx?ID=63) and dazzled until the end of its next turn.
